title: Coronavirus Fake News - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/7/20
itunes:title: Coronavirus Fake News - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/7/20
description:
George Noory and investigative reporter Jon Rappoport discuss whether the news media is reporting on the coronavirus accurately, or if they are highlighting bad news to create a panic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
